entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Stephen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Stephen 2:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 41 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -17.0°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. High minus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 9.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 30 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
